spiritsExplanation:
The workout "Lower Body Strength with Bands" is best classified under the "Structured & Disciplined" spirit due to its focus on strength-building with the use of a mini band, indicating methodical and technique-focused exercises. The description emphasizes 'building strength,' showcasing a disciplined approach typical of resistance training, earning it a score of 0.7.

The "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit is also applicable, as the image depicts a workout setting on a dock by a river, aligning with nature-based and exploratory environments. This visual aspect, combined with the "on-the-mat" categorization, suggests an outdoor component, warranting a score of 0.6.

The music playlist, featuring upbeat pop tracks, supports a rhythmic flow but does not distinctly indicate a "Flow & Rhythm" spirit due to the structured nature of the workout. Other spirits, such as "High-Energy & Intense" and "Soothing & Restorative," are excluded due to the workout's focus on strength rather than high-intensity cardio or relaxation.
